product_name: Zoot Performance Tri Team Racerback Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Ready for races or just tough training sessions, the Zoot Performance Tri Team Racerback Tank Top for women stays comfortable even when you decide to push the pace. Performance fabric provides compression and muscle support, reducing muscle fatigue while increasing endurance. Moisture-wicking, quick-dry fabric with flatlock seams reduces chafing for optimal comfort; 4-way stretch offers unrestricted range of motion. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zoot Performance Tri Team Racerback Tank Top features multiple stretch-mesh rear pockets that hold energy gel, spare tube or other small essentials.
short_description: Ready for races or just tough training sessions, the Zoot Performance Tri Team Racerback Tank Top for women stays comfortable even when you decide to push the pace.
